column2: Tom turned into Savoy Place at twenty-seven minutes past eleven, to face a fleet of stationary limousines disgorging their passengers outside the hotel.
column3: Be Careful What You Wish For

column2: It's from one of the more recent plates the tree has scanned: 11.27 in the morning of 4 April 1175
column3: The Second Internet Cafe, Part 2: The Cascade Annihilator
